name: Roboskates
description:
The evil scientist has kiddnaped you and your family. Luckily you manage to escape his minions. Equipped with nothing but your skates you need to make your way to his hidden lair. On your way you will have to fight your family and friends to free them from the robotic upgrades that control their actions.

Are you strong enough?

To MOVE left or right use A and D or the arrow keys.

While in the air you can press S or DOWN ARROW to ACCELERATE DOWNWARDS.

JUMPING is currently bind to the SPACEBAR.

RAILS are activated by holding LSHIFT.

To ATTACK an enemy press the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON.

DASH is triggered by pressing the RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON.

While dashing you can trigger DASHATTACK by attacking.

You can also use the DIVEATTACK by pressing S or DOWN ARROW and LEFT MOUSE BUTTON while you are midair.

4 weeks are a lot less time than we first thought. We are a new team and sadly lack a talented lvl designer. Nevertheless we really ejoyed participating and think that our project is worth further development. We currently have 4 more enemys and 1 boss waiting to be implemented.

HAVE FUN!
